Articles.Content:
...I have already posted before this, but I might as well as introduce myself properly, albeit late:

I'm "Fred Cop", but not quite since its a fictional name I came up with. I do get addicted to Kerbal Space Program but only when its my point of interest, and occasionally I'll end up staying away from KSP for a while.

I may have played the Demo and the full game for, roughly, a total of a year or under, but I don't have a strong-point in KSP unless "Undersight with landers leaving Jeb, Bob, Bill and even Valentina stuck on the Mun" counts.

If anyone ever looks for me, I'll more than likely be floating around the Fan-made stuff, since I like seeing how far people go with KSP, wether it'd be incredible Kerbal Cinematics, Insanely detailed Artwork or even Paper-models of Kerbal Rockets.

--"Fred Cop"--

Hello Fred Cop, and welcome!

I'm sure I'll see you around.

Happy landings!

Fred Cop! It's good to see you!

But don't be a registered lurker, post some of your own stuff. It's much better that way.

Welcome!

Hiya Fred Cop. I agree, there are some pretty incredible player made pieces of art. Glad to see you in the community.

Welcome to the forums! :

Cheers,

-Claw
I'm pretty sure everyone has left a Kerbal stranded somewhere sometime. It's part of the fun. Welcome to the community!
